page.title: 16Sythwood School, Horsell
page.content: Although being in a rather urban area, Sythwood is in a pleasant situation with a surprisingly rural element. Inside the actual building are eight classrooms filled with children and helpful teachers. A large school hall is used for other essentials in a school child's life, such as P.E., assemblies and eating lunch. We have an extremely large playing field with a running track, cricket and rounders pitches in the summer and football pitches in the winter. We also have a netball court marked on the playground, along with markings for several other small games.
